statement.p: At a recent Pac-12 sporting event, there were 45,000 Buffaloes fans and 8,400 Wildcats fans. Write each ratio as as a reduced fraction.
A) The ratio of Buffaloes fans to Wildcats fans. Preview Question 1 Part 1 of 2
B) The ratio of Buffaloes fans to total fans. Preview Question 1 Part 2 of 2
